No one yet seems to understand in government the reality of Lowe pay.

There are plenty of jobs around. It’s just that they are all paying at breakeven level.

By that, I mean everything you earn will more or less go out on bills. You are merely existing not living.

text:
Just seen a night audit job at a hotel. £12p/h. 

It’s a lot of responsibility. They invariably make you act up as night manager, so you are responsible for the hotel.

It was good pay when I did it at Heathrow as a student. 

But 12 quid in London? Zone 6 commute? Sod that.
